name: Wigwam Gobi Liner 2 Pack Socks - Unisex
description: These fitted socks feature fabric technology that lets yarns next to the skin wick moisture to the outer sock to help keep your foot drier and warmer. By allowing some of the friction caused by walking to take place between the liner sock and the main sock, liner socks may also help reduce blistering.Made of a polypropylene and spandex blend to help keep feet dry.Wonder-Wick™ fabric technology wicks away moisture.Includes 2 pairs.
